mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, LOCATION, CONTENT, PERSON, FOLDER, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CREATED, MODIFY FROM ARTICLE WHERE ISPRIVATE = #{isPrivate, jdbcType=BIT} AND USERID = #{userId, jdbcType=SMALLINT} AND ID = #{id, jdbcType=SMALLINT}
